source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_00<tab>Your reputation precedes you, if the wide-eyed look the stranger is favoring you with is any indication.
target: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチの人の好さそうな闘士は、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_01<tab>In Rhalgr's Reach you are approached by a starry-eyed Ala Mhigan who thanks you for your service to the Resistance and states that he wishes to share with you an opportunity. Perhaps believing it to be more dramatic, he refrains from telling you what the opportunity actually is, and instead bids you speak with a mysterious veteran who waits for you outside Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_01<tab>人の好さそうな闘士と話した。ラールガーズリーチの外、ストライプヒルズにいるという「傷だらけの偉丈夫」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_02<tab>The veteran tells you of a place called the Circles of Answering, where the monks of the Fist of Rhalgr used to hone body and mind. By the grace of his Doman patron, this training ground has been reborn as Stone, Sky, Sea...in spirit, if not in name. There you may challenge striking dummies tailored to the strengths of various beings fantastic and otherworldly. Should you triumph in the allotted time, you will know you are ready to face them in battle...though whether or not you will survive the actual encounter is an altogether different question. Dummies, after all, do not hit back...
target: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SEQ_02<tab>傷だらけの偉丈夫から、悟りの円座という場所の存在を聞いた。かつて星導教のモンク僧たちは、強者との戦いへと赴く前に、悟りの円座へと立ち寄り、木人を相手に技のキレを確認したという。技の確認をしたくなったら、再び「傷だらけの偉丈夫」に声をかけよう。
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_TODO_00<tab>ストライプヒルズにいる傷だらけの偉丈夫と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_RESISTANCE02940_000_001<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>! Hero of the Resistance! Greetings and well met. I wished to thank you for your countless deeds in service to our cause, and share with you an opportunity which I believe may be of interest to you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_RESISTANCE02940_000_001)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ちょっといいかい。
アラミゴ奪還の立役者であるアンタと、
会って話してみたいという奴がいるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_RESISTANCE02940_000_002<tab>There is a great and wise man─a veteran of countless battles─who waits for you outside Rhalgr's Reach. Go to him, and he will unfold all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_RESISTANCE02940_000_002奴は、ギラバニア辺境地帯の「ストライプヒルズ」……
ラールガーズリーチを出て、すぐの場所で待っているはず。
気が向いたら、会ってやってほしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_010<tab>It is you. The legendary adventurer instrumental in the liberation of our homeland. Aye, though it took an army to see it through, I have heard tell of your singular accomplishments, both here and in faraway lands.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_010解放軍に協力している冒険者だな？
悲願の成就はお前なくしては果たせなかったと、皆が噂しているぞ。
俺が、ひそかに心を寄せている子もな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_011<tab>Heh heh, I know the type. You are a warrior, through and through, ever searching for a new challenge! A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who lives for those moments when all hangs in the balance!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_011きっとお前は、これからも強敵へと挑み続けるんだろうな……。
そして、不特定多数の者から、好意を向けられるに違いない……。
うらやましすぎて、噛みしめた奥歯が砕けそうだよ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_012<tab>...Did I say something odd? No, of course not. Ahem! Not far from here is a place where monks of the Fist of Rhalgr once honed body and spirit: the Circles of Answering! And, by the grace of our Doman patron, it is reborn!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_012……さておき、この先に「悟りの円座」と呼ばれる場所がある。
かつて星導教のモンク僧たちは、強者との戦いへと赴く前に、
必ず円座に立ち寄り、木人を相手に技のキレを確認したという。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_013<tab>"<var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> who fights with strength of stone unyielding, breathes deep of boundless sky and embraces serenity of rolling sea, against <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> none can stand.“
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_013木人相手の修行で何が得られるかは、お前の想像力次第……
ある高僧は、こう言った……木人とは、心を映す鏡である、と……。
お前の心の中に映る宿敵を、木人に投影するんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_014<tab>To wit, you will face striking dummies possessed of the fortitude of fantastic fiends and otherworldly foes. Attack them with your might and main, and should you triumph in the allotted time, you will know you have the strength to defeat them...though you may still die in the process. They are dummies, after all, and will not hit back. But that goes without saying.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_014見事、打ち倒せればそれでよし。
もしも倒せぬならば、その相手に挑むには時期尚早ということだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_015<tab>Doubtless you are intrigued. When curiosity overwhelms you, I shall deliver you to Stone, Sky─ Well, it is still the “Circles of Answering” in name, but you must nevertheless embrace the wisdom of the elements to overcome your trials!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_015もしお前が、強敵との戦いに備え、
「悟りの円座」で修行したいときは、声をかけてくれ。
現地まで誘導しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_016<tab>Oh, how foolish of me! I forgot to tell you the best part: it's free!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_GREATMAN02940_000_016……そして、お前が強敵を倒したときは、声高らかに宣言してくれ。
俺が想いを寄せる、器量よしのあの子の耳にも届くように、
勝利の影には、木人へと導いてくれた俺の存在があったとな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SYSTEM_000_018<tab>You now have access to the Circles of Answering─an expansion of Stone, Sky, Sea. This training ground can be accessed by speaking with the battle-scarred veteran outside Rhalgr's Reach.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY109_02940_SYSTEM_000_018「木人討滅戦」に挑戦可能になりました。
このコンテンツは、コンテンツファインダーからではなく、
「傷だらけの偉丈夫」に話しかけることで開始できます。
